derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: shortening of Old French espurge, from espurgier, from Latin expurgare 'cleanse' (because of the purgative properties of the milky latex)

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous plants of the genus Euphorbia; usually having milky often poisonous juice
